appContainer.description: The image used for the initial chatbot application interface.
appContainer.title: App Container

appPort.description: The exposed port of the application.
appPort.title: App Port

gitDefaultBranch.description: The default branch for the chatbot application Github repository.
gitDefaultBranch.title: Git Default Branch

gitSecretKeyToken.description: The name of the Secret's key with the Github token value.
gitSecretKeyToken.title: Secret Key Token

gitSecretName.description: The name of the Secret containing the required Github token.
gitSecretName.title: Secret Name

gitSourceRepo.description: The Github Repository with the contents of the ai-lab sample chatbot application. It must be either the 'redhat-ai-dev/ai-lab-samples' or its fork.
gitSourceRepo.title: Git Source Repo

githubOrgName.description: [REQUIRED] The Github Organization name that the chatbot application repository will be created into.
githubOrgName.title: GitHub Org Name

quayAccountName.description: [REQUIRED] The quay.io account that the application image will be pushed.
quayAccountName.title: Quay Account Name

existingModelServer.description: Adds support of existing model server for the deployed application. If selected it overrides the vLLM & llama.cpp use cases.
existingModelServer.title: Use Existing Model Server

includeModelEndpointSecret.description: Adds support for bearer authentication for the existing model server endpoint.
includeModelEndpointSecret.title: Existing Model Bearer Authentication Support

initContainer.description: The image used for the initContainer of the model service deployment.
initContainer.title: Init Container

maxModelLength.description: The maximum sequence length of the model. It is used only for the vllm case and the default value is 4096.
maxModelLength.title: Model Max Length

modelEndpoint.description: The endpoint url of the model for the existing model service case. Is used only if existingModelServer is set to true.
modelEndpoint.title: Existing Model Endpoint URL

modelEndpointSecretKey.description: The name of the secret field storing the bearer value for the existing model service if the endpoint requires bearer authentication. Is used only if includeModelEndpointSecret is set to true.
modelEndpointSecretKey.title: Existing Model Endpoint Secret Key

modelEndpointSecretName.description: The name of the secret storing the credentials for the existing model service for bearer authentication. Is used only if includeModelEndpointSecret is set to true.
modelEndpointSecretName.title: Existing Model Endpoint Secret Name

modelName.description: The name of the model. It is used only in the vLLM use case.
modelName.title: Model Name

modelPath.description: The path of the model file inside the model service container.
modelPath.title: Path

modelServiceContainer.description: The image used for the model service.
modelServiceContainer.title: Service Container

modelServicePort.description: The exposed port of the model service.
modelServicePort.title: Service Port

vllmModelServiceContainer.description: The image used for the model service for the vLLM use case.
vllmModelServiceContainer.title: vLLM Image

vllmSelected.description: Adds support of vLLM instead of llama_cpp. Be sure that your system has GPU support for this case.
vllmSelected.title: Use vLLM
